parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the FinSpace environment to be created.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Add tags to your FinSpace environment. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: federationMode
parameters.description: Authentication mode for the environment. FEDERATED - Users access FinSpace through Single Sign On (SSO) via your Identity provider. LOCAL - Users access FinSpace via email and password managed within the FinSpace environment.

parameters.name: federationParameters
parameters.description: Configuration information when authentication mode is FEDERATED. samlMetadataDocument (string) --- SAML 2.0 Metadata document from identity provider (IdP). samlMetadataURL (string) --- Provide the metadata URL from your SAML 2.0 compliant identity provider (IdP). applicationCallBackURL (string) --- The redirect or sign-in URL that should be entered into the SAML 2.0 compliant identity provider configuration (IdP). federationURN (string) --- The Uniform Resource Name (URN). Also referred as Service Provider URN or Audience URI or Service Provider Entity ID. federationProviderName (string) --- Name of the identity provider (IdP). attributeMap (dict) --- SAML attribute name and value. The name must always be Email and the value should be set to the attribute definition in which user email is set. For example, name would be Email and value http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/emailaddress. Please check your SAML 2.0 compliant identity provider (IdP) documentation for details. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_params.name: samlMetadataDocument
nested_params.description: SAML 2.0 Metadata document from identity provider (IdP).

nested_params.name: samlMetadataURL
nested_params.description: Provide the metadata URL from your SAML 2.0 compliant identity provider (IdP).

nested_params.name: applicationCallBackURL
nested_params.description: The redirect or sign-in URL that should be entered into the SAML 2.0 compliant identity provider configuration (IdP).

nested_params.name: federationURN
nested_params.description: The Uniform Resource Name (URN). Also referred as Service Provider URN or Audience URI or Service Provider Entity ID.

nested_params.name: attributeMap
nested_params.description: SAML attribute name and value. The name must always be Email and the value should be set to the attribute definition in which user email is set. For example, name would be Email and value http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/emailaddress. Please check your SAML 2.0 compliant identity provider (IdP) documentation for details.

parameters.name: superuserParameters
parameters.description: Configuration information for the superuser. The email address of the superuser. The first name of the superuser. The last name of the superuser.

nested_params.name: emailAddress
nested_params.description: The email address of the superuser.

nested_params.name: firstName
nested_params.description: The first name of the superuser.

nested_params.name: lastName
nested_params.description: The last name of the superuser.

parameters.name: dataBundles
parameters.description: The list of Amazon Resource Names (ARN) of the data bundles to install. Currently supported data bundle ARNs: arn:aws:finspace:${Region}::data-bundle/capital-markets-sample - Contains sample Capital Markets datasets, categories and controlled vocabularies. arn:aws:finspace:${Region}::data-bundle/taq (default) - Contains trades and quotes data in addition to sample Capital Markets data. (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data bundle.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for FinSpace environment that you created.

nested_items.name: environmentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the FinSpace environment that you created.

nested_items.name: environmentUrl
nested_items.description: The sign-in URL for the web application of the FinSpace environment you created.
